shovill
=======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which shovill installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using shovill, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load shovill/1.1.0-gompi-2021b
```
